About

As a senior studying Information Systems, I am passionate about the intersection of technology and human desires. I have a strong interest in full stack & front-end engineering as well as design research. Through my academic coursework and extracurricular activities, I have gained technical skills in programming languages such as Java and Python, as well as experience with design principles and tools. I am eager to apply my skills and continue learning in a dynamic and challenging environment where I can collaborate with diverse teams.
